name: DoNut Steal
description:
If you are robot DoNut steal from ninja or you will be executed.

How to play:

WASD or ZQSD - movement

E - actions (pick up items, open doors, etc.)

This is strategic puzzle game that was created for Mini game jam 60 - Crime

I hope you would enjoy playing.

This game is not complete and I will continue to update this game.
